overview: While Killzone 2 (and 3s) servers will officially shut down at the end of March 2018; its legend as a technological achievement in console FPS games will live on forever. As a bit of a retrospect, here we dive in DEEP into the nostalgia and break down Killzone 2 from its inception.
tagline: Grab some popcorn, a glass of liquor and turn on the surround sound because this aint no ordinary documentary. This is Killzone muthafuckin 2 ya undastand!!?
title: KILLZONE 2: EPIC DEVELOPMENT
